title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XV, pt. 811 - State Aid For Comprehensive Studies And Reports Under General Municipal Law, Article 5-j

7. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
